participant_2.background:
I am a ballet dancer.
I work many hours rehearsing for my show.
I like movies based on comedies.
My favorite food is hamburgers.

content.text: Not much, just getting ready for a ballet recital.
Oh, that sounds exciting! What kind of ballet are you performing?
It's a comedy ballet called "The Nutcracker Suite."
Oh, I love that ballet! I've seen it a few times.
Really? That's great! What did you think of it?
I thought it was absolutely beautiful. The music was wonderful and the dancing was amazing.
I'm glad you enjoyed it! It's one of my favorite ballets to perform.
So, what's your favorite part about the ballet?
I think my favorite part is the dancing. The choreography is so intricate and beautiful.
I agree, the dancing is incredible. I'm always amazed at how much skill and athleticism is required to perform ballet.
It is a lot of work, but it's so much fun! I love being able to express myself through dance.
I can imagine. It must be a great feeling to be able to share your passion with an audience.
It is. I love being able to make people laugh and cry with my dancing.
That's so wonderful. I'm sure you're going to do a great job at your recital.
Thanks! I'm really excited for it.
